name: Mortgage interest deduction - top bracket rate cap
description: €100,000 gross with €10,000 mortgage interest. Taxpayer is in the 49.5% top bracket but the mortgage benefit must be capped at 37.48%. Without the surtax correction the engine would report a €4,950 saving (10000 × 49.5%); with the correction the saving should be ~€3,748 (10000 × 37.48%).

sources.description: NL 2025 mortgage deduction capped at 37.48% for top-bracket earners
